extension.description: Display and manage a forum for a specific course

field.name: plugin_access
field.label: Default Plugin Access
field.description: Default access level assigned to the blog plugin.

field.name: display_limit
field.label: Display Limit
field.description: The number of records to display at a time.

field.name: comments_depth
field.label: Depth
field.description: The number of levels comments can be nested. 1 level would be just comments, no replies to comments.

field.name: discussions_threads
field.label: Show threads from
field.description: Determine what threads to show to students in this section. NOTE: Sticky threads show across all sections regardless of this setting.

field.name: discussions_category
field.label: Discussion threads
field.description: Allow discussion threads on this or not?
